title: This monitor surprised me - LG UltraGear 32GQ950

Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 1:30 Stand Assembly 2:20 I/O 3:15 Overview 7:50 Powering Display 11:10 Overclocking 12:25 Gaming
